name: Bug on the moon 🌘🐛
description:
Game :

Last year for Game off 2020 I made my first game jam,
this year for the Game off 2021 I made a sequel of this game.

Description :

After having successfully landed on the moon. It appears that your robot suffers from some bugs.

Your goal is to fix the bugs and reach the main room to complete your mission.

Instructions :

Move your robot with "WASD" keys and use your mouse to put the good value on code emplacement.

Credits : Music :

By the great JC https://soundcloud.com/julescournut
